Name: Barsbold
description:
The person in this photo is Barsbold. He is 26 years old, married, and has 2 children. He has been buying secondary raw materials such as copper, iron, and alloys from people for 2 years and supplying them to large factories. He started this business with his wife, and they decided to start this business because they have a real desire to keep the environment clean and reduce waste in nature.

He plans to expand his business and buy raw materials from further afield. He needs a truck to transport his raw materials for this expansion, so he will get a car with this loan.
